description: Retrieves a remote file from a remote network server.

input.name: address
input.description:
The the full address of file on the network.
Takes the form of `\\server\path\file.txt` or `//server/path/file.text` where server is either a host name or an IP address.

input.name: encoding
input.description: Input file encoding. Supported encodings are: `ascii`, `base64`, `binary`, `hex`, `ucs2`, `utf8`, or `latin1`.
